paragraphs.text:
%md
Read in the data from csv files

result.msg: Read in the data from csv files

paragraphs.text:
val sqlContext = new SQLContext(sc)
val df_edges = sqlContext.read
        .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")
        .option("header", "true") // Use first line of all files as header
        .option("inferSchema", "true") // Automatically infer data types
        .load("/Users/charles.copley/Documents/insight/journalAbstractParsing/MNRAS_edges.csv")
        .withColumnRenamed("V1","Institute1")
        .withColumnRenamed("V2","Institute2")
        .withColumnRenamed("","Edge_number")

val df_nodes = df_edges.select("Institute1").withColumnRenamed("Institute1","Institute")
                        .unionAll(df_edges.select("Institute2").withColumnRenamed("Institute2","Institute"))
                        .distinct
                        .withColumnRenamed("Institute","id")

df_nodes: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: string]

//create a new edge list where a connection is represented by a single edge with a count attribute showing the strength of that tie
val df_edges = edges.groupBy("src","dst").count
df_edges.show(20)
df_edges.count

res36: Long = 57138

paragraphs.text:
val graph = GraphFrame(df_nodes, df_edges)
val dfnodes = graph.degrees.as('a)
        .join(graph.outDegrees.as('b),$"a.id"===$"b.id","left_outer")
        .join(graph.inDegrees.as('c),$"a.id"===$"c.id","left_outer")
        .select($"a.*",$"b.outDegree",$"c.inDegree")
        .na.fill(0)
        .orderBy(desc("degree"))
        .withColumnRenamed("outDegree","out_degree")
        .withColumnRenamed("inDegree","in_degree")
        .persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
dfnodes.show(10)

paragraphs.text:
val triangles = graph.triangleCount
                .run()
                .withColumnRenamed("count","triangle_count")

val id_triangles_degree = dfnodes.select("id","degree")
                .as("a")
                .join(triangles.select("*").withColumnRenamed("id","id1").as("b"),$"a.id"===$"b.id1")
                .drop("id1")

import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
def clustering(t: Int, k: Int): Double = {
         val denom =   (k.toDouble * (k.toDouble - 1.0))
          if(denom!=0)  2.0 * t.toDouble  / denom
                   else Double.NaN
                           }
val funcClusterCalc = udf(clustering _)

val clustering_nodes = id_triangles_degree
                     .select($"*", funcClusterCalc($"triangle_count", $"degree") as "clustering")
                     .na.fill(0)
                     .persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
